## Putting it together

```{r}
who
who %>% colnames
who %>% gather(case_cat, count, `new_sp_m014`:`newrel_f65`)
who %>% gather(case_cat, count, `new_sp_m014`:`newrel_f65`) %>% separate(case_cat, into = c('temp1', 'temp2')) %>% group_by(temp1) %>% count()
who %>% gather(case_cat, count, `new_sp_m014`:`newrel_f65`) %>% separate(case_cat, into = c('temp1', 'temp2'), sep = 3) %>% group_by(temp1) %>% count()
```
